section_text:
(a)
               
            

               Any violation of this Code by any officer, agent or other person acting for or employed
               by any corporation or unincorporated association or organization, while acting within
               the scope of his office or employment, shall, in every case, also be deemed to be
               a violation by such corporation, association or organization.
               
            

               (b)
               
            

               Any officer, agent or other person acting for or employed by any corporation or unincorporated
               association or organization shall be subject and liable to punishment as well as such
               corporation or unincorporated association or organization for the violation by it
               of any provisions of this Code, where such violation was the act or omission, or the
               result of the act, omission or order, of any such person.
               
            

               (Code 1993, Â§ 1-8)
